requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
course_description: The relationship between sequence, structure, and function of macromolecules focusing on the practical aspects of macromolecular synthesis, structural and functional characterization, and degradation. Students who withdraw from the laboratory course must withdraw from the co-requisite lecture course. *Exceptions to the withdrawal policy require Chemistry Department approval.
prerequisites: CHEM_OX 203 and CHEM_OX 203L as prerequisites or equivalent transfer credit. Student must enroll in CHEM_OX 204L first, then in CHEM_OX 204. Students must be enrolled in both courses or will be dropped at preregistration or Add/Drop/Swap.
